TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataPointCollection extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1<class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>
Public Class DataPointCollection Inherits ChartElementCollection(Of DataPoint)

summary.span: 表示 物件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別表示的集合物件，依序代表資料點屬於物件。The class represents a collection of objects, which in turn represent the data points that are part of a object. 這個集合類別會實作為屬性物件。This collection class is implemented as the property of a object. 物件可以附加或插入至集合的 X 值與 Y-已指定為參數的值。 objects can be appended or inserted into the collection with their X-value and Y-value(s) already specified as parameters. 請注意，它們也會自動填入一系列繫結至資料來源使用時或方法。Note that they are also added automatically when a series is bound to a data source using either the or method. 它們出現在此集合中，只有集合所屬的數列的順序會繪製資料點及其屬性設定為`true`(預設值是`false`)，則所有資料點的所有 X 值都為零。Data points are plotted in the order that they occur in this collection only if the series that the collection belongs to has its property set to `true` (the default value is `false`), or if all X-values for all data points are zero. 否則會繪製資料點，使用它們的 X 值。Otherwise data points are plotted using their X-values. 資料點都可能位於，和操作，根據 最大值、 最小值或指定的 X 或 Y 值使用的多載`FindMaxValue`，`FindMinValue`或`FindValue`方法，分別。Data points can be located, and manipulated, based on maximum, minimum or specified X or Y-values using the overloaded `FindMaxValue`, `FindMinValue` or `FindValue` methods, respectively. [DataPointCollection.Count]()屬性表示在集合中的項目總數，通常用來尋找集合中的上限。The [DataPointCollection.Count]() property indicates the total number of items in the collection and is commonly used to find the upper bound of the collection.

param.name: y
param.span: Y 值。

span.span: The Y-value.

summary.span: 將新的 物件加入到集合並且設定它的 Y 值。

span.span: Adds a new object to the collection and sets its Y value.
The new object.

summary.span: 使用指定的 X 值與 Y 值，將 物件加入至集合的結尾。

span.span: Adds a object to the end of the collection, with the specified X-value and Y-value(s).

span.span: Y-value of the data point.

summary.span: 將 物件加入至集合的結尾，並且使用指定的 X 值與 Y 值。

span.span: Adds a object to the end of the collection, with the specified X-value and Y-value.

returns.span: 表示以零起始之索引的 ，此索引是項目在資料點集合中的插入位置。

span.span: An that represents the zero-based index where the item was inserted into the data point collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會加入物件至; 物件永遠會加入到集合的結尾。This method adds object to the ; the object is always added to the end of the collection. 使用方法多載，如果您的資料點會需要多個 Y 值。Use the method overload if your data points require more than one Y-value. 如果您的資料點不需要的 X 值 — 也就是說，如果您要建立非散佈圖等 — 使用方法改為。If your data points do not need an X-value—that is, if you are creating non-scatter plots—use the method instead.

param.name: xValue
param.span: 資料點的 X 值。

param.name: yValue
param.span: 一個或多個以逗號分隔值，表示資料點的 Y 值。

span.span: One or more comma-separated values that represent the Y-value(s) of the data point.

summary.span: 使用指定的 X 值與 Y 值，將 物件加入至集合的結尾。

span.span: Adds a object to the end of the collection, with the specified X-value and Y-value(s).

returns.span: 值，表示以零起始的索引位置，也就是項目在集合中的插入位置。

span.span: An value that represents the zero-based index where the item was inserted into the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會將其中一個物件至; 「 資料點永遠會加入到集合的結尾。This method adds one object to the ; the data point is always added to the end of the collection. 您必須提供至少一 （1） 的 Y 值，否則會擲回例外狀況。You must provide at least one (1) Y-value, otherwise an exception will be thrown. 這個方法也會檢查屬性物件這項資料屬於; 如果太多的 Y 值指定，將會擲回例外狀況。This method also checks the property of the object that this data belongs to; if too many Y-values are specified, an exception will be thrown. 為了讓造成影響的格式，值必須是物件。In order for formatting to have an effect, a value must be a object. 如果您的資料點不需要的 X 值 — 也就是說，如果您要建立非散佈圖等 — 使用方法改為If your data points do not need an X-value—that is, if you are creating non-scatter plots—use the method instead

summary.span: 使用指定的 Y 值，將 物件加入至集合的結尾。

span.span: Adds a object to the end of the collection, with the specified Y-value(s).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會將其中一個物件至; 「 資料點永遠會加入到集合的結尾。This method adds one object to the ; the data point is always added to the end of the collection. 使用允許的 Y 值陣列，如果您的資料點會需要多個 Y 值的方法定義。Use the method definition that allows for an array of Y-values if your data points require more than one Y-value. 如果您的資料點需要的 X 值 — 也就是說，如果您要建立散佈圖等 — 使用其中一種`AddXY`方法改為。If your data points need an X-value—that is, if you are creating scatter plots—use one of the `AddXY` methods instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會將其中一個物件至; 「 資料點永遠會加入到集合的結尾。This method adds one object to the ; the data point is always added to the end of the collection. 您必須提供至少一 （1） 的 Y 值，否則會擲回例外狀況。You must provide at least one (1) Y-value, otherwise an exception will be thrown. 這個方法也會檢查屬性這項資料所屬的物件; 如果太多的 Y 值指定，將會擲回例外狀況。This method also checks the property of the object this data belongs to; if too many Y-values are specified, an exception will be thrown. X 值將永遠設定為零 (0)，導致非散佈圖。The X-value will always be set to zero (0), resulting in non-scatter plots. 如果您想要使用 X 值的資料點時，呼叫其中一種`AddXY`方法改為。If you want the data points to use an X-value, call one of the `AddXY` methods instead. 為了讓造成影響的格式，值必須是物件。In order for formatting to have an effect, a value must be a object. 下列為有效的.NET Framework 型別可用的物件型別參數的完整清單，請參閱：Refer to the following for a complete listing of valid .NET Framework types that can be used for the object type parameters: |||| |-|-|-| |StringString|DateTimeDateTime|DoubleDouble| |DecimalDecimal|SingleSingle|Int32Int32| |UInt32UInt32|Int64Int64|UInt64UInt64|

MemberSignature.Value: public void DataBind (System.Collections.IEnumerable dataSource, string xField, string yFields, string otherFields);

member this.DataBind : System.Collections.IEnumerable * string * string * string -> unit

param.name: dataSource
param.span: 資料來源。

span.span: The data source.

param.name: xField
param.span: X 值欄位的名稱。

span.span: The name of the field for X-values.

param.name: yFields
param.span: 以逗號分隔之 Y 值欄位的名稱。

span.span: A comma separated names of the fields for Y-values.

param.name: otherFields
param.span: 其他含繫結規則的資料點屬性格式如下：PointProperty=Field[{Format}] [,PointProperty=Field[{Format}]]。

span.span: Other data point properties with binding rules, in the format: PointProperty=Field[{Format}] [,PointProperty=Field[{Format}]].

param.span: 例如 "Tooltip=Price{C1},Url=WebSiteName"。

span.span: For example: "Tooltip=Price{C1},Url=WebSiteName".

summary.span: 將資料點的 X 值、Y 值以及屬性值 (例如 Tooltip 或 LabelStyle) 資料繫結到資料來源。

span.span: Data binds the X-value, Y-value(s) and property values of the data points, such as Tooltip or LabelStyle, to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料來源可以是 Ole (SQL) DataReader、 DataView、 DataSet、 DataTable 或 DataRow。The data source can be the Ole(SQL)DataReader, DataView, DataSet, DataTable or DataRow.

summary.span: 將集合資料點的 X 值和 Y 值資料繫結到指定之資料來源的前幾個資料行。

span.span: Data binds the X-value and Y-values of the collection's data points to the first columns of the specified data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DataBindXY (System.Collections.IEnumerable xValue, params System.Collections.IEnumerable[] yValues);
.method public hidebysig instance void DataBindXY(class System.Collections.IEnumerable xValue, class System.Collections.IEnumerable[] yValues) cil managed
Public Sub DataBindXY (xValue As IEnumerable, ParamArray yValues As IEnumerable())
public: void DataBindXY(System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ xValue, ... cli::array <System::Collections::IEnumerable ^> ^ yValues);
member this.DataBindXY : System.Collections.IEnumerable * System.Collections.IEnumerable[] -> unit

param.name: xValue
param.span: 將提供資料點 X 值的資料來源。

span.span: The data source that will supply the X-values for the data points.

param.name: yValues
param.span: 要加入到集合中並以逗號分隔之 物件的 Y 值清單。

span.span: A comma-separated list of the Y-value(s) of the object added to the collection.

summary.span: 將集合資料點的 X 值和 Y 值資料繫結到指定之資料來源的前幾個資料行。

span.span: Data binds the X-value and Y-values of the collection's data points to the first columns of the specified data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繫結所有中的物件，和使用不同的資料來源的 X 和 Y 的值。This method binds all objects in a , and uses separate data sources for the X and Y-value(s). 請注意，將會使用第一個可用的資料行，資料來源中如果資料繫結至資料表。Note that the first available column in the data source will be used if data-binding to a table. 若要繫結至第一個資料行以外的資料行，使用方法。To bind to a column other than the first column, use the method. 您可以藉由提供逗號分隔的清單的繫結至多個 Y 值物件`yValues`參數。You can bind to multiple Y-values by providing a comma-separated list of objects for the `yValues` parameter. 如果未提供 Y 值的資料來源，或如果未提供錯誤的值數目，則會擲回例外狀況。If Y-values are not provided by the data source, or if the wrong number of values are provided, an exception will be thrown. 如果您不想顯示散佈圖類型的繪圖，其中 X 和 Y 值使用中，使用其中一種`DataBindY`方法改為。If you do not want to display scatter-type plots, in which both X and Y-values are used, use one of the `DataBindY` methods instead. 以下是您可以使用做為資料來源參數的物件清單：The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source parameter: - DataViewDataView - 資料讀取器 （SQL、 OleDB）Data readers (SQL, OleDB) - 陣列Arrays - 清單Lists - 所有其他物件使用介面。All other objects that use the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DataBindXY (System.Collections.IEnumerable xValue, string xField, System.Collections.IEnumerable yValue, string yFields);
.method public hidebysig instance void DataBindXY(class System.Collections.IEnumerable xValue, string xField, class System.Collections.IEnumerable yValue, string yFields) cil managed
Public Sub DataBindXY (xValue As IEnumerable, xField As String, yValue As IEnumerable, yFields As String)

member this.DataBindXY : System.Collections.IEnumerable * string * System.Collections.IEnumerable * string -> unit

param.name: xValue
param.span: 將提供資料點 X 值的資料來源。

span.span: The data source that will supply the X-values for the data points.

param.name: xField
param.span: 將提供資料點 X 值的資料行名稱。

span.span: The name of the column that will supply the X-values for the data points.

param.name: yValue
param.span: 要加入到集合中並以逗號分隔之 物件的 Y 值清單。

span.span: A comma-separated list of the Y-value(s) of the object added to the collection.

param.name: yFields
param.span: 以逗號分隔的資料行名稱清單，這些名稱會提供資料點的 Y 值。

span.span: A comma-separated list of column name(s) that will supply the Y-values for the data points.

param.span: 請注意，您可以使用雙重逗號，將逗號內嵌為資料行名稱的一部分。

span.span: Note that a comma can be embedded as part of a column name, by using a double comma.

summary.span: 將集合中資料點的 X 值和 Y 值資料繫結到指定之資料來源的特定資料行。

span.span: Data binds the X-value and Y-values of the data points in the collection to the specified columns of the specified data sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結的 X 值和 Y 值的資料點至指定的資料來源的第一個資料行集合中。Data binds the X-value and Y-values of the data points in the collection to the specified data source's first columns. 您可以藉由設定繫結至數個 Y 值`yFields`多個資料行名稱的參數。You can bind to several Y-values by setting the `yFields` parameter to multiple column names. 以逗號分隔的資料行名稱。Separate the column names with commas. 如果未提供 Y 值的資料來源，或如果未提供錯誤的值數目，則會擲回例外狀況。If Y-values are not provided by the data source, or if the wrong number of values are provided, an exception will be thrown. 如果您不想顯示散佈圖類型的繪圖，其中 X 和 Y 值使用中，使用其中一種`DataBindY`方法改為。If you do not want to display scatter-type plots, in which both X and Y-values are used, use one of the `DataBindY` methods instead. 以下是您可以使用做為資料來源參數的物件清單：The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source parameter: - DataViewDataView - 資料讀取器 （SQL、 OleDB）Data readers (SQL, OleDB) - 陣列Arrays - 清單Lists - 所有其他物件使用介面。All other objects that use the interface.

summary.span: 將集合資料點的 Y 值資料繫結到指定之資料來源的第一個資料行。

span.span: Data binds the Y-value(s) of the collection's data points to the first column of the specified data source(s).

MemberSignature.Value: public void DataBindY (params System.Collections.IEnumerable[] yValue);
.method public hidebysig instance void DataBindY(class System.Collections.IEnumerable[] yValue) cil managed
Public Sub DataBindY (ParamArray yValue As IEnumerable())
public: void DataBindY(... cli::array <System::Collections::IEnumerable ^> ^ yValue);
member this.DataBindY : System.Collections.IEnumerable[] -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: yValue
param.span: 一個或多個以逗號分隔的 資料來源。

span.span: One or more comma-separated data sources.

summary.span: 將集合資料點的 Y 值資料繫結到指定之資料來源的第一個資料行。

span.span: Data binds the Y-value(s) of the collection's data points to the first column of the specified data source(s).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將繫結 Y-第一個資料行集合中指定之資料來源的資料點的值。This method binds the Y-value(s) of the data points in the collection to the first column of the specified data source(s). 若要將 Y 值的繫結至資料來源資料行不是第一個可用的資料行，使用方法。To bind Y-values to a data source column that is not the first available column, use the method. 您可以繫結數個 Y 值指定多個資料來源，使用`yValue`參數。You can bind several Y-values by specifying multiple data sources, using the `yValue` parameter. 請注意第一個可用的資料行，每個資料來源中，將用於每個資料點的後續的 Y 值。Note that the first available column in each data source will be used for each data point's successive Y-values. 比方說，第一個資料行的第一個資料來源會繫結到第一個資料行，第二個資料點的第一個 Y 值資料來源會繫結至資料點，第二個 Y 值並繼續下一步。For example, the first column of the first data source will be bound to the first Y-value of data points, the first column of the second data source will be bound to the second Y-value of data points, and so forth. 如果未提供 Y 值的資料來源，或如果未提供錯誤的值數目，則會擲回例外狀況。If Y-values are not provided by the data source, or if the wrong number of values are provided, an exception will be thrown. 以下是您可以使用做為資料來源參數的物件清單：The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source parameter: 以下是您可以使用做為資料來源的物件清單：The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source: - DataViewDataView - 資料讀取器 （SQL、 OleDB）Data readers (SQL, OleDB) - 陣列Arrays - 清單Lists - 所有其他物件使用介面。All other objects that use the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DataBindY (System.Collections.IEnumerable yValue, string yFields);
.method public hidebysig instance void DataBindY(class System.Collections.IEnumerable yValue, string yFields) cil managed

public: void DataBindY(System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ yValue, System::String ^ yFields);
member this.DataBindY : System.Collections.IEnumerable * string -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: yValue
param.span: 提供 Y 值的 資料來源物件。

span.span: An data source object that provides the Y-value(s).

param.name: yFields
param.span: 要將資料點繫結到的資料來源欄位。

span.span: The data source field(s) to which to bind data point(s).

param.span: 請注意，您可以使用雙重逗號，將逗號內嵌為資料行名稱的一部分。

span.span: Note that a comma can be embedded as part of a column name, by using a double comma.

summary.span: 將資料點的 Y 值資料繫結到指定之資料來源的特定資料行。

span.span: Data binds the Y-value(s) of the data points to the specified column(s) of the specified data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將資料點的 Y 值繫結至資料來源的指定欄位 (s) 集合中。This method binds the Y-values of the data points in the collection to the specified fields(s) of the data source. 若要只繫結至資料來源中的第一個欄位，使用方法。To bind only to the first field in a data source, use the method. 您可以藉由設定繫結至數個欄位`yFields`會以逗號分隔的多個欄位名稱的參數。You can bind to several fields by setting the `yFields` parameter to multiple field names that are comma-separated. 請注意，第一個欄位將會用於資料點的第一個 Y 值，將會用於資料點的第二個 Y 值，第二個具名的欄位等等。Note that the first field will be used for the data point's first Y-value, the second named field will be used for the data point's second Y-value, and so forth. 如果未提供 Y 值的資料來源，或提供錯誤的值數目，將會擲回例外狀況。If Y-values are not provided by the data source, or the wrong number of values are provided, an exception will be thrown. 以下是您可以使用做為資料來源的物件清單：The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source: - DataViewDataView - 資料讀取器 （SQL、 OleDB）Data readers (SQL, OleDB) - 陣列Arrays - 清單Lists - 所有其他物件使用介面。All other objects that use the interface.
